metadata.title: CVE-2023-25193 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
hb-ot-layout-gsubgpos.hh in HarfBuzz through 6.0.0 allows attackers totrigger O(n^2) growth via consecutive marks during the process of lookingback for base glyphs when attaching marks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25193` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-harfbuzz-0.0 - 8.3.0-2build2
libharfbuzz-bin - 8.3.0-2build2
libharfbuzz-cairo0 - 8.3.0-2build2
libharfbuzz-gobject0 - 8.3.0-2build2
libharfbuzz-icu0 - 8.3.0-2build2
libharfbuzz-subset0 - 8.3.0-2build2
libharfbuzz0b - 8.3.0-2build2
No subscription required

openjdk-11-demo - 11.0.20+8-1ubuntu1
openjdk-11-jdk - 11.0.20+8-1ubuntu1
openjdk-11-jdk-headless - 11.0.20+8-1ubuntu1
openjdk-11-jre - 11.0.20+8-1ubuntu1
openjdk-11-jre-headless - 11.0.20+8-1ubuntu1
openjdk-11-jre-zero - 11.0.20+8-1ubuntu1
openjdk-11-source - 11.0.20+8-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

openjdk-17-demo - 17.0.8+7-1
openjdk-17-jdk - 17.0.8+7-1
openjdk-17-jdk-headless - 17.0.8+7-1
openjdk-17-jre - 17.0.8+7-1
openjdk-17-jre-headless - 17.0.8+7-1
openjdk-17-jre-zero - 17.0.8+7-1
openjdk-17-source - 17.0.8+7-1
No subscription required

openjdk-21-demo - 21+35-1
openjdk-21-jdk - 21+35-1
openjdk-21-jdk-headless - 21+35-1
openjdk-21-jre - 21+35-1
openjdk-21-jre-headless - 21+35-1
openjdk-21-jre-zero - 21+35-1
openjdk-21-source - 21+35-1
openjdk-21-testsupport - 21+35-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: harfbuzz package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.3.0-2build2').
openjdk-lts package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.0.20+8-1ubuntu1').
openjdk-17 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '17.0.8+7-1').
openjdk-21 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '21+35-1').
openjdk-22 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
